pinyin: Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 cao3 yuan2

definition: Barkol grasslands near Hami in Xinjiang
Bayanbulak grasslands in Uldus basin of Tianshan mountains
pinyin: Ba1 yin1 bu4 ke4 cao3 yuan2

definition: Urat plain in Bayan Nur 巴彥淖爾|巴彦淖尔[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3], Inner Mongolia
(bird species of China) steppe grey shrike (Lanius pallidirostris)
(bird species of China) calandra lark (Melanocorypha calandra)
(bird species of China) steppe eagle (Aquila nipalensis)
(bird species of China) pallid harrier (Circus macrourus)

sentences.english: O'er plains where the tamarind grew.
sentences.chinese: 罗望子长满一望无际的草原。

sentences.english: Both has the fertile soil fertile farmland, bumper grain harvest, and has the broad prairie, a hundred flowers in full bloom.
sentences.chinese: 既有沃土良田，五谷丰登，又有广阔草原，百花盛开。

sentences.english: There is a reach of grassland in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 远处是连绵一片的草原。

sentences.english: You look like a melodious madrigal, beautiful snowy mountain, beautiful prairie.
sentences.chinese: 你象一只悠扬的牧歌，美了雪山，美了草原。

sentences.english: An anaconda in the Llanos of Venezuela.
sentences.chinese: 委内瑞拉大草原上的水蟒。

sentences.english: The only thing you could hear was the wind rustling through the grass.
sentences.chinese: 唯一能听到的是风吹过草原时发出的沙沙声。

sentences.english: Grassland has the magical power to make tings simple.
sentences.chinese: 草原有着神奇的化繁为简的能力。

sentences.english: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. 2. Brick quiz whangs veldt fox.
sentences.chinese: 关于砖头的测验把一只跳跃的草原狐狸给难住了。

sentences.english: The maximum elevation of 650 meters or more, is that the so-called pampas area.
sentences.chinese: 海拔650公尺以上的最高处是所谓的彭巴草原区。

sentences.english: Large herds of bison used to live on the plains of North America.
sentences.chinese: 大群的野牛过去曾生活在北美大草原上。

sentences.english: A cowboy fell off his horse and broke his leg on the prairie.
sentences.chinese: 一个牛仔在大草原上从马背上摔了下来，摔断了腿。

sentences.english: Leymus chinensis and Stipa grandis are dominant species with a wide distribution in the Inner Mongolian steppes.
sentences.chinese: 羊草和大针茅是内蒙古典型草原地带性分布的优势种。

sentences.english: The pampas are still among the most fecund lands in the world.
sentences.chinese: 南美大草原仍然是世界上最肥沃的土地之一。

sentences.english: Typical of the grassland dwellers of the continent is theAmerican antelope, or pronghorn.
sentences.chinese: 美洲羚羊，或称叉角羚，是该大陆典型的草原动物。

sentences.english: This is the unique and the last veldt.
sentences.chinese: 这是唯一的，最后的，草原。

sentences.english: There was less food for birds and also for the prairie dog.
sentences.chinese: 供鸟类以及草原土拨鼠吃的食物也少了。

pinyin: Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 cao3 yuan2
